1513810.name: Sporadic Fear
1513810.description:
Sporadic Fear is a retro-stylized survival-horror game that will feature multiple stories to play through with different characters as well as a choice of perspective: first-person, over the shoulder or fixed camera third-person.

Play through the stories of Alec Rosman and Bella Sanchez as they battle through an alternate dimension of hellish souls and slowly reveal a surprising conspiracy to be true.

The game features classic survival-horror elements such as:
Inventory and Crafting
Manual Saving
Resource Management
Stealth
Combat
Treasures, Rewards and Upgrades
